flixel.text.FlxTextFormat

type
class
implements
flixel.interfaces.IFlxDestroyable
defined in
flixel.text.FlxText

Constructor

new(?FontColor : Int, ?Bold : Bool, ?Italic : Bool, ?BorderColor : Int, ?Start : Int, ?End : Int)
parameters
FontColor (Optional) Set the font color. By default, inherits from the default format.
Bold (Optional) Set the font to bold. The font must support bold. By default, false.
Italic (Optional) Set the font to italics. The font must support italics. Only works in Flash. By default, false.
BorderColor (Optional) Set the border color. By default, no border (The color is TRANSPARENT)
Start (Default=-1) The start index of the string where the format will be applied. If not set, the format won't be applied.
End (Default=-1) The end index of the string where the format will be applied.

Instance Variables

borderColor : Int

The border color if FlxText has a shadow or a border

end : Int

The end index of the string where the format will be applied

format(default,null) : flash.text.TextFormat

Internal TextFormat

start : Int

The start index of the string where the format will be applied

Instance Methods

destroy() : Void
